ygData.subject: Maxima and Hydras
ygData.msgSnippet: The breeze brushed over her. But to her, it felt as though it were him touching & kissing her. Oh, how she wished she were there. His words, especially wishing

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

The breeze brushed over her. But to her, it felt as though it were him 
touching & kissing her. Oh, how she wished she were there. His words, especially 
wishing she was there so that he could shower her with kisses warmed her 
lasercore terribly. Causing the ache to grow. "I can only imagine, Hydras," she purred 
warmly.

Then she replied about Blackstorm, "Yes, she has been kept well enough busy. &
 far enough away from prying Autobot optics. If they wanted to find her, they 
would be led on a long wild roboto-goose chase. She did pick up a couple new 
bots, unknown what side they serve. & as I said, on our way to rendezvous with 
Decepticons she intercepted. She's doing rather well, for being 
reprogrammed." 

Then she dropped to a deeper voice & a slightly serious tone. "We have a 
slight little issue. I was at the Ark. We have some new arrivals at the Ark as 
well. One claims to be the combined offspring of Megatron & Optimus Prime." 

She waited for his response to that one. 

--part1_7a.40a4d580.2c05b068_boundary
